Quest.QuestDescription: The Local magic merchant is in need of assistance

Task.TaskTitle: Talk to the local magic merchant
Task.TaskText: Go and talk to the local magic merchant he is normally located near the east walls of the castle

Conversation.Dialogue: Magic Merchant: Are you the one who has been helping people out around here?
Magic Merchant: Brilliant, would you like to help me?
{CHARACTER_NAME}: I would, what would you like?
Magic Merchant: Wonderful, apparently a very rare magic gem has appeared on the far side of the forest near to the silver caves ...
Magic Merchant: ... as it is dangerous outside the castle walls could you go and check and retrieve it for me if it is there?
Magic Merchant: Great, see you back here soon then
Magic Merchant: Aha! You have the gem
Magic Merchant: Wonderful, you are a great help, I will let people know you helped me
